author: Ng Han Guan and Joe McDonald
title: Stores, shopping malls reopen in Wuhan as city gradually revives from coronavirus outbreak - USA TODAY
description: Stores, shopping malls reopen in Wuhan as city gradually revives from coronavirus outbreak USA TODAY Wuhan residents say coronavirus figures released by China don't add up Fox News Wuhan COVID-19 Death Toll May Be in Tens of Thousands, Data on Cremations and …
content:
With coronavirus sweeping across the world, it's easy to forget the epicenter of the disease, Wuhan. Wuhan can be compared to Pittsburgh or Chicago.
USA TODAY
